channel.title: Pages on The Mech Programming Language
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on The Mech Programming Language

item.title: Community
item.author: cmontella@live.com (Corey Montella)
item.description: Repository The Mech code repository is hosted on GitHab: https://github.com/mech-lang/mech You can submit pull requests and issues using their web interface. Chat For quick help, drop by our Gitter channel. Mailing List Join or read the Mech mailing list at Google Groups. Twitter Follow us on Twitter @MechLang.

item.title: Learn
item.author: cmontella@live.com (Corey Montella)
item.description: Documentation Some brief documentation to start out with. Tables Create a singleton table #value = 1 #name = "Alan Turing" Create an array #vector = [1 2 3] Create a column array #column = [1; 2; 3] Create a 2D table #two-by-three = [1 2 3 4 5 6] Create a table with named columns #with-columns = [|name age height| "Yan" 20 100 "Seth" 23 102] Create an inline table
